name: Togepi

evolution.description: Togepi can evolve into Togetic at level 7 and above when its loyalty is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spike Ball Pokémon. As its energy, Togepi uses the positive emotions of compassion and pleasure exuded by people and Pokémon. This Pokémon stores up feelings of happiness inside its shell, then shares them with others.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: This Pokémon increases its critical hit range by 1 (20 to 19+, etc.)
